Northeast Ohio GMB

Cleveland - Akron - Canton

The IWW is a union for all workers across all industries. We are a dedicated, worker-run, international union committed to organizing in our workplaces, industries, and our communities.

Founded in 1905, the IWW works towards a better society based on worker control, and economic democracy. The IWW is dedicated to the values laid out in our preamble.

Northeast Ohio GMB  •  2016
